description: Ensure focusable elements are not visually hidden without an alternative.
recommendation: Avoid hiding focusable elements with display:none or visibility:hidden unless they are removed from tab order. (WCAG 2.1 SC 2.4.7)
algorithm: Tracks hidden elements (aria-hidden/hidden/display:none/visibility:hidden or XAML Visibility) and flags those that remain focusable or referenced.
algorithm_advanced: Parses element stream to track hidden state (aria-hidden/hidden/style display:none/visibility:hidden or XAML Visibility) and flags focusable or referenced elements inside hidden regions.
